code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white male aged 22 Ys with C/O mild epigastric pain for 12 days that is frequent. pt also reports Stomach. he drinks alcohol occasionally Patient does not smoke o:Height 184 cm, Weight 75.7 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.

s:24 YO M student presents with increased severe abdominal pain, severe diarrhea and severe epigastric pain over 15 months. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 77.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:a 24 year old white male complained of severe abdominal pain, severe epigastric pain, severe diarrhea and Stomach. pt denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 184 cm, Weight 76.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Proximal gastric vagotomy - stomach.
